subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Of the 52 players drafted by the Mets in 2008, all but 12 had washed out of organized baseball by the start of this season. The figures for most of the other clubs weren’t much better.
snippet: Of the 52 players drafted by the Mets in 2008, all but 12 had washed out of organized baseball by the start of this season. The figures for most of the other clubs weren’t much better.
